articles.author: Vinamrata Chaturvedi, Quartz
articles.title: Everything to Know About Bitcoin Pizza Day
articles.description: On May 22, 2010, a man in Florida paid 10,000 Bitcoin for pizza.Read more...
articles.content: On January 3, 2009, Bitcoins creator, Satoshi Nakamoto, mined the first block of the Bitcoin blockchain, known as the Genesis Block, which contained a reward of 50 Bitcoin. The technical foundations … [+1156 chars]

articles.author: Andy Greenberg
articles.title: A Vast New Dataset Could Supercharge the AI Hunt for Crypto Money Laundering
articles.description: Blockchain analysis firm Elliptic, MIT, and IBM, have released a new AI detection model—and the 200-million-transaction dataset it's trained on—that aims to spot the “shape” of Bitcoin money laundering.
articles.content: As a test of their resulting AI tool, the researchers checked its outputs with one cryptocurrency exchangewhich the paper doesn't nameidentifying 52 suspicious chains of transactions that had all ult… [+3279 chars]
